title.narrative: Emissions Reductions in the Forest Sector Through Planted Forests with Major Investors

description.narrative: The project will support smallholder farmers, SMEs and the client plantation forestry company to transform degraded landscapes into highly productive mosaics of forestry blocks, out-grower tree production, houses, agricultural fields and well-managed natural forests. One important element will be to define and register land rights for 14,000 households in and around IFC client plantation concessions (DUATs) in Zambezia.
